snippet: Bitcoin has fluctuated wildly in value, but it could indirectly point the way toward a system of better pricing and risk management.
abstract: Robert J Shiller Economic View column examines Bitcoin phenomenon, saying its future is very much in doubt, but its innovations can lead to benefits for economy; notes that it has fluctuated wildly in value, but it could point the way to a system of better pricing and risk management.
lead_paragraph: Bitcoin has fluctuated wildly in value, but it could indirectly point the way toward a system of better pricing and risk management.
